mapper.select: select t1.acc_number as accNumber, t1.acc_name as accName, t1.fy_num as fyNum, t1.fy_name as fyName from cloud_dynamic_subject t1
select t1.acc_number as accNumber, t1.acc_name as accName, t1.fy_num as fyNum, t1.fy_name as fyName from cloud_dynamic_subject t1 where t1.acc_name = #{accName} order by t1.fy_num
select t1.acc_number as accNumber, t1.acc_name as accName, t1.fy_num as fyNum, t1.fy_name as fyName from cloud_dynamic_subject t1 where t1.fy_name = #{fyName}
